title: Apple Ships iOS 17.3, Warns of WebKit Zero-Day Exploitation
description:
Apple pushes out fresh versions of its iOS and macOS platforms to fix WebKit vulnerabilities being exploited as zero-day in the wild.

The post Apple Ships iOS 17.3, Warns of WebKit Zero-Day Exploitation appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Security Experts Describe AI Technologies They Want to See
description:
SecurityWeek interviews a wide spectrum of security experts on AI-driven cybersecurity use-cases that are worth immediate attention.

The post Security Experts Describe AI Technologies They Want to See appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Hackers Targeting Critical Atlassian Confluence Vulnerability Days After Disclosure
description:
The Atlassian Confluence vulnerability CVE-2023-22527 is being exploited in the wild just days after it was disclosed. 

The post Hackers Targeting Critical Atlassian Confluence Vulnerability Days After Disclosure appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: LoanDepot Breach: 16.6 Million People Impacted
description:
Lending giant LoanDepot (NYSE: LDI) said that roughly 16.6 million individuals were impacted as a result of a ransomware attack.

The post LoanDepot Breach: 16.6 Million People Impacted appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: New NTLM Hash Leak Attacks Target Outlook, Windows Programs
description:
Varonis finds one vulnerability and three attack methods that can be used to obtain NTLM hashes via Outlook and two Windows programs.

The post New NTLM Hash Leak Attacks Target Outlook, Windows Programs appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Owner of Cybercrime Website BreachForums Sentenced to Supervised Release
description:
Conor Brian Fitzpatrick, the owner of the cybercrime website BreachForums, was sentenced to time served and supervised release.

The post Owner of Cybercrime Website BreachForums Sentenced to Supervised Release appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Chinese Spies Exploited VMware vCenter Server Vulnerability Since 2021
description:
CVE-2023-34048, a vCenter Server vulnerability patched in October 2023, had been exploited as zero-day for a year and a half.

The post Chinese Spies Exploited VMware vCenter Server Vulnerability Since 2021 appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: France Fines Yahoo 10 Mn Euros Over Cookie Abuses
description:
France's data protection watchdog fines Yahoo 10 million euros for not respecting users' refusals of internet-tracking "cookies"

The post France Fines Yahoo 10 Mn Euros Over Cookie Abuses appeared first on SecurityWeek.
